ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] [OT] Word of the Day
ygData.msgSnippet: Am I the only one who sees irony in the name: Final Fantasy 10 ? ... I have always been grossly disappointed in Final Fantasy...with all that graphic hoopla,
ygData.messageBody:
Am I the only one who sees irony in the name: "Final Fantasy 10" ?
KAZ <kazvorpal@...> wrote: --- JESSICA_WEBBER@... wrote:
> *** Scarier than that: an in-law's very young son, on a visit to a farm
> with his mom, pointed to some hens and said, "Look mommy, Chocobos."

I have always been grossly disappointed in Final Fantasy...with all that
graphic hoopla, you'd think they could spend a few moments/megs adding actual
sounds instead of the pointless, endless MIDI nonsense, and get rid of the
horrible Japanese RPG combat interface, too.

I hear they have actually added sounds in FF10, though.


=====
Coffee contains water...so does your pee
